entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
